author: trent_vanepps
content:
As of ACDC #154 last week:

- Pectra mainnet date confirmed to be **May 7 2025**
- Client releases by April 21 2025
- Pectra mainnet blog post by April 23 2025

Read the call notes: https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/all-core-devs-consensus-acdc-154/23340/2
See the list of 11 EIPs here: https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-7600

author: trent_vanepps
content: posted and pinned a new one, at least until the releases are out in a few weeks. thanks for surfacing!
